item.title: The creator economy’s ad revenue problem and India’s AI ambitions
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: The creator economy is evolving fast, and ad revenue alone isn’t cutting it anymore. YouTubers are launching product lines, acquiring startups, and building actual business empires. In fact, MrBeast’s company bought fintech startup Step, and his chocolate business is outearning his media arm. This isn’t just one creator’s strategy. For many, it’s the new playbook.  On this episode of TechCrunch’s Equity podcast, hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan unpack how creators are diversifying beyond ads, […]

item.title: Why creators are ditching ad revenue for chocolate bars and fintech acquisitions
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo, Anthony Ha, Rebecca Bellan, Kirsten Korosec
item.description: The creator economy is evolving fast, and ad revenue alone isn’t cutting it anymore. YouTubers are launching product lines, acquiring startups, and building actual business empires. In fact, MrBeast’s company bought fintech startup Step, and his chocolate business is out-earning his media arm. This isn’t just one creator’s strategy. For many, it’s the new playbook. […]

item.title: Anthropic-funded group backs candidate attacked by rival AI super PAC
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Dueling pro-AI PACs have centered around backing or targeting one New York congressional bid: Alex Bores, whose RAISE Act requires AI developers to disclose safety protocols and report serious system misuse.

item.title: InScope nabs $14.5M to solve the pain of financial reporting
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The startup, founded by accountants who worked at Flexport, Miro, Hopin and Thrive Global, automates the difficulties of prepping financial statements.

item.title: Great news for xAI: Grok is now pretty good at answering questions about Baldur’s Gate
item.dc:creator: Russell Brandom
item.description: A new report from Business Insider reveals that high-level engineers at xAI were pulled off other projects to make sure Grok could answer detailed questions about the video game Baldur's Gate.

item.title: ‘Toy Story 5’ takes aim at creepy AI toys: ‘I’m always listening’
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Addictive, AI-enabled tablets are taking over, and also, Woody is balding in the new Toy Story movie, out June 19.

item.title: AI’s promise to indie filmmakers: Faster, cheaper, lonelier
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: AI expands access to filmmaking for resource-constrained creators. But as efficiency becomes the industry’s north star, creativity risks being overwhelmed by a deluge of low-effort, AI-generated content.

item.title: Peak XV raises $1.3B, doubles down on AI as global VC rivalry in India heats up
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Peak XV says most of its new capital will target India as the firm prioritizes AI, fintech and cross-border bets while navigating recent partner departures.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 Super Early Bird rates end in 1 week
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: The lowest ticket rates of the year for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 end next Friday, February 27. Save up to $680 on your pass. Register now before prices increase.

item.title: OpenAI says 18- to 24-year-olds account for nearly 50% of ChatGPT usage in India
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: The company said on Friday that users between 18 and 24 years of age account for nearly 50% of all messages sent by Indians to ChatGPT, and users under 30 account for 80% of usage in the country.

item.title: UAE’s G42 teams up with Cerebras to deploy 8 exaflops of compute in India
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Abu Dhabi-based tech company G42 has partnered with U.S.-based chipmaker Cerebras to deploy 8 exaflops of compute through a new system in India.

item.title: General Catalyst commits $5B to India over five years
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: The pledge marks a sharp jump from General Catalyst's earlier $500 million–$1 billion India earmark.

item.title: Google’s new Gemini Pro model has record benchmark scores — again
item.dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
item.description: Gemini 3.1 Pro promises a Google LLM capable of handling more complex forms of work.

item.title: Nvidia deepens early-stage push into India’s AI startup ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Nvidia is working with investors, nonprofits, and venture firms to build earlier ties with India's fast-growing AI founder ecosystem.

item.title: Why these startup CEOs don’t think AI will replace human roles
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: The CEOs of Read AI and Lucidya told TechCrunch at Web Summit Qatar that they see AI tools replacing tasks, rather than workers.

item.title: YouTube’s latest experiment brings its conversational AI tool to TVs
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: YouTube is testing conversational AI on smart TVs, allowing viewers to ask the assistant questions related to the video they're watching on the big screen.

item.title: Reddit is testing a new AI search feature for shopping
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: A small group of users in the U.S. will start to see search results that include interactive product carousels with pricing, images, and direct where-to-buy links.

item.title: All the important news from the ongoing India AI Impact Summit
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: India is hosting a four-day AI Summit this week that will be attended by executives from major AI labs and Big Tech, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Nvidia, Microsoft, Google, and Cloudflare, as well as heads of state.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion.

item.title: Reload wants to give your AI agents a shared memory
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Reload announces a $2.275 million raise in a round led by Anthemis and the launch of its first AI employee, Epic.
